resources.string: Massively change your life in 30 days with this awesome and simple to use action tracking system

Your Action Tracking App has one simple objective To daily keep you on track with the actions you need to take to guarantee you will achieve your goals, whatever they may be. If you are seriously passionate about achieving your goals, then measuring your daily actions performed against a predetermined monthly target of actions is vital. This is a very simple, quick and easy to use system to enable you to do that. It provides you with feedback everyday on whether you are on track, ahead or behind your targets so if necessary you can take corrective action tomorrow to get you back on track . The system works brilliantly and a warning-it can be addictive. I have used it for over 30 years in my business career and private life with awesome results
It is rarely a lack of knowledge that holds us back from success, but rather a lack of the actual doing. The execution of the actions are the real causes of failure.
Successful people have formed the habit of doing things that failures don\'t like doing and won\'t do.
For any business decision, there are only two choices-action or inaction. Action is the foundational key to all success
Do you want to know who you are? Don\'t ask-act! Action will delineate and define you.
Action may not always bring happiness; But there is no happiness without action
A London University study revels that habits are formed after 66 days of repeated actions. When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don\'t adjust the goals...adjust the action steps.
You sow a action, you reap a habit. You sow a habit, you reap a character. You sow a character, You reap a destiny.
